name: Pembina Pipeline Corporation cumulative redeemable rate reset class A preferred shares series 9
longDescription: Pembina Pipeline is midstream company serving the Canadian and North American ( primarily Bakken) markets with an integrated product portfolio. The firms' assets include pipelines and gas gathering, as well as assets across fractionation, storage, and propane exports.
fulldescription: Pembina Pipeline is midstream company serving the Canadian and North American ( primarily Bakken) markets with an integrated product portfolio. The firms' assets include pipelines and gas gathering, as well as assets across fractionation, storage, and propane exports.
